channel.title: Kader's Soulful/Deep House Podcast (Live Mixes)
channel.description:
I put these together primarily for the love of it, so that I have something to listen to in my journeys, and to share with my friends and family. I've formatted these mixes so that they fit nicely onto a single cd. Please leave a comment and let me know what you think.
So go ahead, click on FOLLOW, download, leave a comment, subscribe for future updates etc... most of all, enjoy.
Blessed LOVE.
Kader
Follow me on itunues at
http://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewPodcast?id=387799620

item.title: Nu Disco Vol. 1
item.description: I'm not really entirely sure what the Nu Disco thing is all about really, but the first few tracks I heard being categorized as such had a real early mid to late 80's feels to it, so I went with that. I've had most of these in the collection for a bit now, they're not too new and you will have heard most of them by now, but this was my chance to put them together in my own little way. The only thing I might call new would be the Soul Clap joint. It was artists like Lovebirds and Miquel Campbell that made me start to pay attention. A couple of remakes in here, so I've touched 'em up with the original vocals for those of you that don't know. The begining track... the Jets ('87), laugh if you wish, but that shit was crazy back then, just the intro to "Crush On You" alone would fill the floor. Cherelle we all should know from back in '84!. Alright, thats enough... I'm aging myself! Tracklisting: 1. The Jets – Rocket To You 2. Choklate – Break My Heat (Kola Kube NY House Mix) b/w Wham - Everything She Wants 3. Choklate – Break My Heat/Original Extended Mix 4. Choklate - The Tea (Original) 5. Majuva – Township Funk 6. Julius Papp/Lisa Shaw – Miracle (Smash Hunter Disco Soul Vocal Mix) 7. A Klass feat. Saraya - Lonely (Sonny Fodera Vocal Mix) 8. Soul Clap feat Roldy Cezaire – Let It Go (Miguel Campbell Remix) 9. Miguel Campbell – Something Special 10. Kraak & Smaak feat Lex Empress – Hold Back Love (Lovebirds Remix) 11. H.O.S.H - What Do You Want Me To Say 12. Mowgli feat. Amber Jolene - Back In The Day 13. MAM - Modern Heat b/w Cherelle – Didn’t Mean To Turn You On 14. So Phat! - A Love Bizarre (Solomun Remix) 15. Miguel Migs Feat Capleton - System (Petalpusher Salted Disco Dub) So there you have it, a likkle something different for June. If I had to choose a favorite, it would probably be a toss up between The Tea (Manoo version used in Soulful 13 in 2010) and the Kraak/Smaak release, cant get enough of those. Hope you all feel this... it's a bit down tempo, but nothing wrong with that... Next up... a deep house mix I think. Gotta bang one out for a dicerned listener who's got me sweating on what direction to go!!! Deep and hard I'm being told! Stay Blessed family, be well. Comments welcome. Kader

item.title: MOJITO Vol. 6
item.description: About once a year or so, I put out a latin inspired mix, mostly due to the few and far between availablity of decent latin house tracks. This mix is about 6 months overdue, sorry Rafael. This episode finds us building up to the club moments (Mojito 7), although it stands on its own really, but we're talking more Tambor than Pacha. Please let me know what you think, leave a comment if you feel so inclined, it's the only "payment" I get. Tracklisting: 1. Pablo Fierro - El Carinosa (Gregor Salto Remix) 2. Papo Sanchez - Guaguanco (Samba & Ronilo Loco Mix) 3. Gregor Salto Feat. Gerardo Rosales - Paranda Loca (Original Mix) 4. Louie Vega Vs Cerrone - Love Ritual (Main Mix) 5. Franky Rizardo - Caracoles 6. Tego Calderon - Corillo De Los Trangalanga (Jose Marquez Remix) 7. Celiz Cruz - Elegua (Jose Marquez Remix) 8. The Djoon Experience - Catalina (Jose Marquez Remix) 9. Joe Arroyo - La Tortuga (Luciano Remix) 10. Polyrhythm - Afro Cuba (Original Mix) 11. DJ Pippi & Fabio Genito Feat. Asuncion - Ya Sta! (Main Mix) 12. Hallex.M - Mi Casa (Justin Imperial Remix) 13. Kiko Navarro feat C.B. - Sonando Contigo (Kiko Navarro Re-Work/Yotam Avni Remix) 14. Pablo Fierro - La Libertad (Original Mix) As usual, I tend to go on a bit of a binge with a fave producer sometimes, and this time around, Jose Marquez fit the bill. Love this guy's productions. As an added bonus, I start and end with Pablo Fierro... awsome producer/dj/artiste from the Canary Islands... check him out here recording La Libertad!!! the close out track and by far my favorite on this set.... Pablo Fierro – Making of La Libertad… http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3QFyNbWgzDc Stay blessed, live and love life... KAS

item.title: KAS @Junction 42
item.description: So... I made it to Junction 42! Inside of going out, I stayed in. In a garage. In a smokey garage. Me and my rig. I ran a mix, and a friend of mine who I've been trying to get into this thing called deep house, actually thought it was the best he has heard me do. (Usually he falls asleep!) So, I took the concept, and expanded on it, and this was born. My own personal mix for my birthday. A gift to self of sorts. But me being me, I've giving it to you. Track listing: 01 - Exist - Lookin At Blue (Original Mix) 02 - Tuccillo & Kiki Navarro feat. Amor - Lovery (Yoruba Soul Mix) 03 - Mustafa feat Natalia - Circles (Boddhi Satva Ancestral Soul Remix) 04 - DJ Kent feat. Malehloka Hlalele - Falling (DJ Kent's Unreleased Mix) 05 - DJ Pippi, Tuccillo & Kiko Navarro - Back 2 Back (Boddhi Satvas Ancestral Soul Remix) 06 - Kenny Larkin & Shlomi Aber - Sketches (Shlomi Aber Version) 07 - Luomo - Tessio (Stimming Remix) 08 - Rasmus Faber Feat. Emily Mcewan - Never Figure Out (Stimming Remix) 09 - Liquideep - Feel It (Stimming Vocal Mix) 10 - Osunlade - Envision (Ame Remix) 11 - Intruder (A Murk Production) feat. Jei - Amame (Radio S.lave Remix) 12 - Winx - Dont Laugh - Manoo's Laugh Remix 13 - Curramberos De Gamero - La Preñá (Osunlade's Yoruba Soul Mix) 14 - Black Motion feat. Xoli - Set Me Free (Ezel Remix) 15 - Louie Vega - Vega 3 16 - Rhythm & Sound - Ruff Way (Afefe Iku Remix) So I went on a bit of a Stimming forage as you may have noticed. Good thing I did too really. Hard arse tracks if you ask me. But then again that's just me. I ended up using some tracks I've used before. I do apologize, but I think the whole thing marinates well, and justifies re-using them and placing them with more tasty buffet items, no? Me thinks so... Happy Birthday to you all. Stay Blessed Kader And if I had to, then it would have to be Osunlade's twist on Curramberos De Gamero's La Preñá. Having said that Afefe Iku's remix of Rhythm & Sound's Ruff Way is always a personal favorite, regardless of what else is going on!!!

item.title: Global Soul
item.description: Things are kinda crazy right now... new paths being chosen, new future. So to slow things down a bit, I went on a little excursion around the world in my spare tracks and came up with a little global essence and spice. Hope ya'll feel it. Track listing: 01 - [UK/JAPAN/GHANA]- Afrobuddha meets kakatsitsi drummers - obame (radio mix) 02 - [UK/NORTH AFRICA] - Zepherin Saint - Midnight Mawal (extended vocal mix) 03 - [UK] - Enawadan - Forever (Club Edit) 04 - [SOUTH AFRICA] - Lemon and Herb feat. Moonchild - Velani (Main Vocal Mix) 05 - [WEST AFRICA/CAPE VERDE] - Anane Vega - Bem Ma Mi (Casamena Living Room Remix) 06 - [SANTO DOMINGO/DOMINICAN REPUBLIC] - Ezel - Flores Blancas 07 - [BOGOTA/COLOMBIA] - Kalero - Asi Asi Asi (Abicah Soul Remix) 08 - [CAPE TOWN/SOUTH AFRICA] - Sundae feat. Nomhle - Xhosa Tribe (Da Capos Bapedi Ritual Remix) 09 - [EILLE/FRANCE] - Dagui Rodann and Timothee Milton - Papa (Main Mix) 10 - [NETHERLANDS] - Jason Cheiron - Umbahj (Dub Mix) 11 - [US] - Heather Walker - I Gave You My Heart (Dj Sound Science Deep Mix) 12 - [LAGOS/NIGERIA/US]Dj Said feat. Reelsoul - Joy Til Midnight (Original Mix) 13 - [MEDITERRANEO/ITALY] - Fabio Genito ft Kaye-ree - Unity (Organic Vocal) So there you have it, a little hop, skip and jump around the world real quick. Nothing too dramatic but a feel for how unified the world in becoming in sound. We listen to music all day long and really have no idea how global influences are spreading until we step back and look at where the music is comming from. This mix has been in my back pocket for a couple months now, was gonna keep it to myself, but kinda busy right now with life so thought I'ld share until Isettle down in a couple weeks. Stay Blessed Podo's, STAY BLESSED. One Love Kader and yes, I pinched the Putumayo cd cover...

item.title: Producer Series - ATJAZZ
item.description: Greetings all, the third in the producer series finds me going into the deep with Martin Iveson, known to us mere mortals as ATJAZZ. I'm not going to bother with much of a bio, as I couldnt possible do him justice. If you don't know his work, SHAME ON YOU!!!! I give you a few of my favorite tracks I've been listening to lately. Here's his website for further information: http://www.atjazz.co.uk I would like to applogize for not including the Atjazz remix of Warm Days’ Selfish Skies. I havent bought it yet. Tracklisting: 01 - Studnitzky - Hauke (Atjazz Base Elements Remix) 02 - Atjazz feat Robert Owens - Love Someone (G. Family Remix) 03 - Ferry Ultra feat. Ann Sexton - Rising Up (Atjazz Remix) 04 - Ezel feat. Djinji Brown - Thunderbolts (Atjazz Remix) 05 - Boddhi Satva feat. Athenai & C Robert Walker - Who Am I (Atjazz Remix) 06 - Dj Le Roi feat Andrea Love - Let It Feel Good (Atjazz Floor Dub) 07 - Oveous Maximus - I Apologize (Atjazz Overpowered Mix) 08 - Black Coffee ft Zakes Bantwini - Juju (Halo & Atjazz Deeply Minded Mix) 09 - Fred Everything ft. Wayne Tennant - Mercyless (Atjazz Vocal Mix) 10 - Freezerroom - Weapon Of Choice (Atjazz Vocal) 11 - Santos - Time of Our Lives (Atjazz Love Soul Remix) 12 - Pete Dafeet - In Flux (Atjazz Remix) 13 - Soulcreation - Cutros Lounge (Atjazz More Than A Remix) 14 - Atjazz And Mark De Clive Lowe - Sweat No Sleep (Original Mix) So there you have it. There's plenty good tracks that I have not included, like the Clyde track "I Forgot You", Ernesto's "Put It On", Clara Hill's "Nowhere", Rainy Payne and Doc Link's "Relax" etc.... Hope you enjoy the journey. If you do, let me know. Friend, Follow, Comment. Stay Blessed. Kader

item.title: RE-UP - Deep/Soulful House Vol 6
item.description: RE-up of mix originally done in March 2012, just for the hell of it, and to piss off Podomatic really. *-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*- I dont know what happened, but I've been kinda lazy lately, did'nt get much new music in over a month, and that was really strange. But I was playing around with a line-up and as soon as wifey left the house, I stepped on it!!! AND, I kinda like it... Need something to even out the volumes though!!! Tracklisting: 01 - Luciano - Tribute_To_The_Sun_(Los_Ninos_De_Fuera) 02 - The CombiNations - Kipanga_(Afro_Mix) 03 - David Harness - The_Rhythm_(Original_Mix) 04 - DJ Gregory & Sidney Samson feat. Damas - Dama_s_Salon_(Main_Mix) 05 - Josh Wink - Jus_Right_(Jimpster_Remix) 06 - Spirit Catcher - Sedona 07 - Hiro - What_Are_You_Trying_To_Say_(Shur-i-kan's_Microrave_Remix) 08 - Soul Purpose - The_Nervous_Track_(M's_Re-Play) 09 - Nathan G - 88_Keys_to_Love 10 - DJ Roland Clark - Soul_Good_(South_Beach_Player_Remix) 11 - Joeski & Matthias Heilibronn - Stuck_In_A_Dream_(Original_Mix) 12 - DJ MFR - Do_You_Remenber_(Vincent_Kwok_Mix) 13 - Quentin Harris & Inaya Day - Do_the_Right_Thing_(Extended_Mix) As always, please support the Artists. All tracks on this release are available on Traxsource.com. Leave a comment if you like. My 12 yr old son LOVES the intro track, so thats my fave!!! Bless Kader

item.title: Deep House Volume 15
item.description: With PodOmatic's new regulations, I will most likely only be able to upload new mixes on the first of the month, when the bandwidth opens up. I cannot afford to upgrade, so I will be busy mixing during the month, and loading them up at the end of the month. Please feel free to donate if you feel so inclined. Donations will not be used to make car nor rent payments.... promise... Here's the tracklisting for this Deep episode: 1. Timoki Tamura - The Rough (Moodymanc Mix) 2. item.title: Club House Volume 6
item.description: And then here's a proper club banger... I sincerely hope you have Happy Year, and wish you and yours peace, happiness and prosperity... Newbies (digitally) on here include the Yves/Ezzy, Samir/Alfred and Junior Sanchez with a delicious starter called Anyway from Duck Sauce, which I’ve been dying to use!!! And then there’s the Purple on himself!!! I loved KOT’s revival of finally from earlier this year, but had never used it so I thought I’ld sneak it in, and what a year for Frankie eh? WOW!!! Director’s Cut making so lovely soulful house music/remixes… Track Listing: 01 – Armand Van Helden & A – Trak Present Duck Sauce – Anyway (Club Mix) 02 – Crazibiza - Back2House (Original Mix) 03 – Crazibiza – Donuts Stew (original mix) 04 – Samir Maslo and Alfred Azzetto – Can You Feel the Force (Samir Maslo Mix) (Dec 27, 2011) 05 – Yves Murasca & Ezzy Safaris – Bunga Bunga! (Original Funky Nipple Mix) (Dec 23, 2011) 06 – Franky Rizardo & Skitzofrenix – Eu Vo Tu Baile (Original Mix) 07 – Dj Chus and Supernova – Carnavalesco (original instereo mix) 08 – Sandy Rivera & Virus J – Put Your Hands Up (JoeySuki Remix) 09 – Bob Sinclar & Raffaella Carra – Far ‘l Amore (Franky Rizardo Remix) 10 – Junior Sanchez – Feel It (At The Warehouse)(original_mix) 11 – Prince – Dance 4 Me (Jamie Lewis Revamped Purple Mix) 12 – CNC Music Factory pres Scarlett Santana – Rain (The Clivilles and Kupper Baby Powder Dub) 13 – Kings of Tomorrow – Finally (Sandy Rivera and Simon Mattsons 2011 mix) 14 – Frankie Knuckles pres. Director's Cut - Your Love (feat. Jamie Principle – Director’s Cut Signature mix) Like/Follow/List/Comment/Post and most of all, enjoy... Stay Blessed Kader

item.title: Afro House Volume 5
item.description: Greetings family, welcome to one of the last mixes posted in 2011 – December 29th to be exact. Not much to say about this one really, other than a couple specials from Jose Marquez, my personal fave’s on the mix, and then what would it be without 100 Zulu Warriors eh? Glad I had not used that track yet. I'm a bit late using it but was saving it for this mix... Tracklisting: 01 – Idrissa Sissoko - Wari (Movement Soul Remix) 02 – Stan-ley and dele sosimi – atide (dj stan-ley deep London raw original mix) 03 – Black Motion feat. Jah Rich - Banane Mavoko (Jose Marquez Remix) 04 – Oumou sangare – mogo te diya bee ye (Jose Marquez Remix) 05 – 100 Zulu Warriors and Roland Clark – 100 Zulu Warriors (Culoe de Song vocal mix) 06 – Bluelle – we are Africa (mr. mama afritalian remix) 07 – P.M. Project – bosiu kaofela (pm project south dub) 08 – Black Motion feat. Soulflow – mumi wango (manoo afro mix) 09 – Zakes Bantwini - Wasting My Time (Rocco Remix) 10 – Devoted feat. Kholi – soul on fire (original mix) 11 – Timmy Regisford feat. Lynn Lockamy – at the club (da capos afro mix) 12 – Lulo Cafe feat. Nothende - I Wanna Love You (Cecil's Rubdown feat. Josh Milan) Peace, health and prosperity to you and yours. Like/Follow/Comment/Favorite/Post if you feel like it. Happy New Years and stay BLESSED... Kader

item.title: Deep House Vol. 14
item.description: Sooooo.... the deep hit me last night, interesting night too to be honest. Anyway, all's well and the mix is ok. Oh, and I figured out what's causing the snaps/drops... my headphones. Turns out there's a bit of a short in the damn thing, and when I nod my head or move around too much, it causes the wires to sway, and the short to reveal itself. Gotta get a new set, got my eyes on a set of Beats. Figured it would happen regardless so didnt re-do the mix. So when you hear a crackle, that's me funkin out!!! Tracklisting: 01 - Rocco - Saharien Child (Original Mix) 02 - Misstress Barbara and H.O.S.H. - Finally Mine (Gorge Remix) 03 - Anja Schneider feat Cari Golden - Something Left (Original Mix) 04 - Lovebirds feat. Stee Downes - Want you in my soul 05 - Siopis - Really Love Ya 06 - Agev Munsen And Roland Clark - That Thing About Deep (Munsens Main Mix) 07 - Ekkohaus - Dance In The Streets 08 - La Pena - Just 09 - Matty Heilbronn - Funky Shit (Martin Buttrich Remix) 10 - Chris Lattner - One is not enough 11 - Ralphi Rosario Feat. Linda Clifford - I Hear The Music (Aki Bergen Dub-O-Matic Mix) 11 - Shlomi Aber - New York Dreamer (Alix Alvarez Remix) 12 - Franck Roger - Lets Go Down (Main Mix) 13 - Moodymann - Shades Of Jae Pt. 1 So there you have it ladies and gents, an infrequent deep mix from me. Not a bad one really. Standout track for me has to be the Lovebirds track "Want You In My Soul" feat Stee Downs, I loose my mind to this track. And then there's that Rocco track!!! Having a little Arab in me my damn self I'm gravitating to this track more and more everyday. Stay Blessed my friends, keep at it. FOLLOW, DOWNLOAD, STREAM, COMMENT... KAS

item.title: Soulful House Vol. 27
item.description: This one was created intentionally as a follow up to Soulful House Vol. 4, done back in 2008, which I still love to listen to. Lots of heavenly joints on here, LOTS of gems. BUT, my favorite has to be the Leon Ware track "On The Beach" with the ATJAZZ Love Soul touch. Tracklisting: 1 - Si Tew feat Pete Simpson - Need To Grow (Yoruba Soul Remix) 2 - Rami Deejay feat. Keely Timlin - Burn Burn (Original Mix) 3 - Leon Ware - On The Beach (Atjazz Love Soul Remix) 4 - Mathew Bandy feat Josh Milan (Frankie Feliciano Ricanstruction Vocal Mix) 5 - Marc Evans & N'Dinga Gaba - My Heart Remembers (N'Dinga's Main Mix) 6 - Bossru feat. Wandile - Ngawe (Atjazz Love Soul Remix) 7 - Julius the Mad Thinker feat. Desla - One Night (Thinker and Kai Mix) 8 - Aphrodisiax and Afronaut feat. Sabrina Chyld - Slip Away (Club Mix) 9 - Cuebar feal Nathan X - Walk A Mile (Ultra Tone In Too Deep Remix) 10 - Exist - 1Beat 2Feet (Kaytronik Remix) 11 - t3n - Line 4 Now (Original Mix) 12 - Menu feat. Kele B. - Grow Again (Main Mix) 13 - Avery Sunshine - Ugly Part Of Me (Terry Hunter Bang) 14 - Ethan White and Marie Tweek - Don't Tell Me (Main Vocal Mix) This one will keep you relaxed, mellow and marinated by any pool, in any situation, and is designed to bring aural bliss into you life, live and direct from mine. Mixed live, and untouched, unedited, unmastered etc... with lots of LOVE. KAS

item.title: Jazz In The House
item.description:
Happy Fathers Day Dad, this one is for you. Thanks for introducing me to jazz all those years ago, and moreover, thanks for letting me use your stereo for all those parties back in the day. Never blew a speaker did I!!!
This one has been in the making for quite a while now, but as ususal, life has a funny way of rearranging your priorities for you. Well I got up early this morning and had at it, and here it is. A rookie mistake or two but it will have to do.
This one won’t be for all of you, don’t expect much in the way of downloads or comments, but I love it.
Track listing: 01 - St Germain - Rose Rouge (Original) 02 - Glenn Underground - Fuego de Sangre 03 - Anthony Nicholson pres. Miquifaye - Future Black Fusion (unreleased demo dub) 04 - Vick Lavender - Chicago Samba (Black Mamba)(Chicago Samba Black Mamba Main V.L.E Mix) 05 - Carlos Vargas and Danny - Party People (Eastside Jazz Mix) 06 - Johnny D And_ Nicky P - Johnick Fire (Original Mix) 07 - Atelewo - New Day (Vocal) 08 - Dele Sosimi - Wahala - Identity Mix (Sosue Soul) 09 - Marlon D vs Mena Keyz - Harlem Jazz (Instrumental) 10 - DSF Ft Steve Jazz - Flow 11 - Lou Gorbea And Chris Perez ft Nina - Babalu Aye (lou2chris Mix) 12 - One51 - Together As One (Tao Jazz Mix)
So there you have it boys and girls... a little JAZZ for your Sunday, for the Fathers...
Stay Blessed. K

item.title: Soulful House Vol. 25
item.description: This one has been lined up for so long... Just couldnt get to it. In the mean time Tracy had a 40th B'Day and several people asked for mixes, the last of whom I would have expected. So in honor of Tracy, I went ahead and cut it today. Happy Birthday Tracy. Tracks: 01 - Osunlade - No Way 02 - Richard Earnshaw feat. Imogen Ryall - cry me a river (black coffee remix) 03 - Dj Kent - Falling ft. Malehlokwa 04 - zakes bantwini feat. xolani sithole - clap your hands (club_mix) 05 - Rocco & C. Robert Walker - I Love The Night (Raw Artistic Soul Vocal Dub) 06 - DaSouL & Fabry Diglio feat. Joe Flame - Broken Love (Deez Class of 95 mix) 07 - Imaani - Found My Light (The Layabouts Vocal Remix) 08 - manoo and francois a ft dyanna fearon - crying for love (vocal mix) 09 - dj man-x and vick lavender feat. shawnee taylor - happy endings (frankie feliciano classic vocal remix) 10 - raoul kahn - thinking about you (main mix) 11 - montana and stewart feat. sofia rubina - i need u back (pete dafeet remix) 12 - Simbad - Come Join In (feat Brian Temba) 13 - miranda nicole - kissing you (duces wild vox) 14 - Josh Milan - Your Body (Louie Vega Eol Mix) So there you have it, an new mix, when I've been busy putting up oldies. Hope you enjoy. Stay Blessed KAS Been listening to this all week and... me like too!!!!

item.title: Soulful House Vol. 24 (R'N'B Edition)
item.description: House music... we can come up with all our own sub genre can't we... so this morning I wanted some sultry vocals and came up with this one... House music with an R'N'B feel. Not Usher or Kells or that kinda stuff, more like DJN Project, 1200 Warriors crew and Reelsoul. Tracklisting: 01 - j.s.o.u.l. aka Black Sinatra - Love Frequency(Dj Hypnosis Retouch Mix) 02 - Moses Mcclean feat. Rob Black - Moses Mcclean feat. Rob Black - Dont Stop (Original Mix) 03 - The 1200 Warriors feat. Craig Mitchell - Sum Luv (1200 Deep Mix) 04 - G-Dubs - Blazin (G-Dubs Original Sureshot) 05 - Mr. Moon and Angel D feat. Michael Flaming - Soulmate 06 - DJN Project feat. Freeway - Lady (Original Mix) 07 - Fusion and DJN Project - Feelings_(Original_Vocal_Mix) 08 - Djn Project and Nef Nunez feat. Joell Ortiz - Be With Me (Mr. V and Reelsoul Moxa Club Dub) 09 - John Legend - SAVE ROOM [REELSOUL MAIN MIX] 10 - Janet Jackson - Time Flys [Reelsoul_REWORK] 11 - AG Thomas - The 1,2 (ReelSoul Vocal) 12 - Slique - Got It For Me (Terry Hunter Remix) 13 - Terry Hunter feat. Terisa Griffin - Wonderful (Abicah Soul Wonderful Remix) 14 - Mr. V feat. Big Daddy - Its About You (Mr. V Sole Channel Main Mix) So there you have it... Please let me know what you think. Bless K

item.title: Deep House Vol. 13
item.description: A beautiful rainy day here in Florida, perfect day for staying home and playing out... Ben Westbeech on intro duties, this time with the Deetron remix. Standout tracks from me include the phenomenal “Every Cow has a Bird” track by Guti & Dubshape and Bedstories by Joyce Muniz. Track listing: 01 – Ben Westbeech - Falling (Deetron Paradise Vocal Remix) 02 – Joel alter – I Feel You 03 – Nathan G – Diamonds In The Sky 04 – James Teej – Night Time Story (Jef K & Gwen Maze Remix ) 05 – Freaks & 012 – Conscious of My Conscience (Henrik Schwarz Remix) 06 – Nic Fanciulli – On the Phone 07 – The Martinez Brothers – The Causeway (Original Mix) 08 – Guti & Dubshape – Every Cow has a Bird 09 – Johnny D - Leave Or Love Me (Original Mix) 10 – Boo Williams - Day and Night 11 – Jaidene Veda Osaze – Sunday (Jimpster Remix) 12 – Maya Jane Coles - What They Say (Dyed Soundorom remix) 13 – Joyce Muniz – Bedstories (Original Mix) 14 – Scope (Ric Mcclelland) – Break it down 15 – Phil Weeks - Slow Dance (U Cry) Enjoy.. K

item.title: Soulful House Vol. 23
item.description: So here's a little something to chill out with today. There are some great tracks on here, including the Yoruba take on Magnetic Man's collaboration with John Legend, Black Coffee with HUGH MASEKELA! and Atjazz's remix or Warm Day's Selfish Skies. A couple of oldies along with a epic remix by Glenn Underground on the opening track makes for great easy listening. Hope you enjoy, repeatedly. Track listing: 01 – The Rurals featuring Jaidene Veda – Into Life (Glenn Underground’s Kiss My Fusion Mix) 02 – The Layabouts featuring Shea Soul – Perfectly (The Layabouts Vocal Mix) 03 – D Moov & Nicole Henry – For The Love Of You (Doruk Ozlen Main Vocal Mix) 04 – Black Coffee featuring Hugh Masekela – We Are One (Black Coffee Original Demo Mix) 05 – Magnetic Man Ft. John Legend - Getting Nowhere - Yoruba Soul Mix 06 – Marissa Guzman – Time to go (Black Coffee Remix) 07 – Warm Days featuring Swindle and Natalie Maddix - Selfish Skies (Atjazz remix) 08 – Ziggy Funk featuring Taliwa - Everyday (Yass classic mix) 09 – Phil Asher & The Mighty Zaf feat. Zansika - Shakin' It Up (Main mix) 10 – Ralf Gum featuring Inaya Day – Lose My Worries (Louis Benedetti Vocal Mix) 11 – Fuminori Kagajo featuring Adeola Ranson – Piece of Heaven (Sean McCabe Paradise Vox Mix) 12 – Reel People featuring Darien – Sure (Frankie Feliciano Classic Vocal Mix) 13 – Temple Movement Presents Queen Aminah – All Night (All Night Main Mix) Hope you like. Stay Blessed. Please subscribe, comment, follow, request more etc if you enjoy this posting. It's what keeps me going. Not going to ask for money, just friendship. Kader

item.title: Soulful House Vol. 21
item.description: The first soulful effort for 2011. Lots of great tracks that I did'nt get to use, as the end of 2010 seemed to be eigther deep or producer related. A few new releases from January 2011 thrown in for good measure, check out the Boddhi Satva & Atjazz produced track by Priss for example. Tracklisting: 01 - Soul Element feat. Peven Everett - How Bad I Want Ya (Main Radio Mix) 02 - Davidson Ospina feat. Mj White - Well Of Love (Main Mix) 03 - Monique Bingham - You.Me.World (Jon Cutlers Distant Music Mix) 04 - Black Coffee ft. Tsepo - Never Saw You Coming (Original Mix) 05 - Jannae Jordan - Me (Tony Loreto SS Vocal Mix) 06 - Samba and Ronilo feat Kadija Kamara - More (More Mix) 07 - Muzzaik feat. Zaida - Work It (Dave Mayer Remix) 08 - Lem Springsteen - New Beginning (Main Mix) 09 - Jaime Woods - Weak (Maurice Joshua Main Mix) 10 - Razor n Guido feat. Tara Harrison - Without You (Mr. V' s Sole Channel Main Mix) 11 - Reelsoul - Spend My Life (Original Mix) 12 - Alexander East - Supposed 2 Be (Original Mix) 13 - Hosanna Littlebird - Times Of Change (Duce Is Wild Club Mix) 14 - Priss - On My Way (Main Mix)(Atjazz & Boddhi Satva Produced) I'm really starting to enjoy this new machine as well, makes me wanna do silly things some times so I'm trying not to experiment too much when recording, but it's sooooo tempting. One of these days I'll do an experimental kinda thing. I've seen dude from djtechdeals do some crazy shit with this machine, but my showman ship is kinda mellow right now so no go. Please feel free to leave a comment, let me know what you think. Stay Blessed. KAS

item.title: Producer Series - Osunlade
item.description: Greetings brothers and sisters, this one should have been the first in the Producer Series, but the track listing kept changing as the my favorites kept changing, and then there was Pyrography. I’ve only put one from Pyrography on here, quite intentionally though, Ser El Santisimo, good Latin vibes, and Osunlade smashes this one. The rest will be sprinkled here and there. Really and truly, Osunlade drew me into house music. I was strictly roots reggae (I owe you a roots cd by the way, trust me its building) and then the Director introduced me to Osunlade touch on Tortured Soul’s Might Do Something Wrong, and have been hooked ever since. These are some of my favorites, not a comp of his best tracks. I’m sure the real Yoruba Soul heads out there would like to strangle me for not using an Erro, or a Tortured Soul etc… there will be another Yoruba Cd, trust me. Track listing: 01 - Andre Torquato Project - Niente (Yoruba Soul Mix) 02 - Osunlade Pres. Nadirah Shakoor - Pride (Osunlade'S Back To Africa Mix) 03 - Magnetic Man Ft. John Legend - Getting Nowhere (Yoruba Soul Mix) 04 - Osunlade - Ser Al Santisimo 05 - Afefe Iku – Mirror Dance featuring Oveous Maximus (Yoruba Soul Remix) 06 - Roy Ayers - Tarzan (Osunlade Yoruba Soul Mix) 07 - Jazztronik - Dentro Mi Alma (Yoruba Soul Mix) 08 - Michelle Amador - Because Of You (Yoruba Soul Remix) 09 - Bah Samba w/Alice Russel - Tired Little One (Yoruba Soul Vocal) 10 - Ben Westbeech - So Good Today ((Yoruba Soul Remix) 11 - Soul Central feat. Abigail Bailey - Time After Time (Yoruba Soul Mix) 12 - Shazz - All I Wanna Give U (Yoruba Soul Remix) 13 - U F O - Listen Love (Yoruba Soul Mix) So there you have it. Let me know what you think please. I'm certainly not choosing a favorite, although if you read the fine print, I'm sure you would read something about Jazztronik, but you didn’t hear that from me. Let me know what you think please. Stay Blessed. KAS

item.title: Producer Series - KARIZMA
item.description: First off, I must apologize for the many different uploads of this one, but I finally got it to what it was supposed to be. This is indeed the FINAL version. Alright then, that said and needless to say, I love Karima's music. Most of these tracks have been used here and there, and were always the more memorable tracks from the mixes. Karizma/Kohesive/Kaytronik etc... nothing I can say will pay this man any justice, so go check him out for yourself. There are those that know and those that don't, this is for those that DON'T. Hope you hear what I hear. Track listing: 01 – Karizma – Groove da Dub (Karizma Dub) 02 – Gel Abril - Spells Of Yoruba (Kaytronik Remix) 03 – DJ Gregory - Don’t Panic (Gregory & Karizma Dub) 04 – Tonya Renee – About You (Karizma Boucha Remix) 05 – Mahon - Closer (Kaytronik Insanely Klose Dub) 06 – Mahon – Closer (Kaytronik Uptown Saturday Nite Remix) 07 – Georg Levin – Late Discovery (Kaytronic Vocal Mix) 08 – Georg Levin – Late Discovery (Kaytronic Dub) 09 – Simbad feat. Abdul Shyllon – Soul Fever (Karizma's K2 Stomp Mix) 10 – Karizma – Good Morning feat. Monique Bingham (Kaytronik Remix) 11 – Raw Artistic Soul - The Light (Feat Ursula Rucker Karizma Deepah remix) 12 – Karizma aka Kaytronik - 33rd Street Anthem 13 – Rhythm of Element – Praia (Karizma Stomp Remix) 14 – Urban Soul - Alright (Karizma Kaytronik Movementz Part 1) 15 – Karizma – Tha D/Karizma Ft Dj Spen - 4 The Love (Karizma'S 4 The Dub) Hope you enjoy. Stay Blessed. Kader

item.title: Producer Series - KENNY DOPE
item.description: This one is a scorcher!!!!! Pure Kenny Dope hype, through and through. The idea behind this one is pretty simple - get you dancing from the jump off!!!! It's not perfect, and the levels drop a little at track 5 (sorry), but I was happy enough with it. I guess there's an app for that right. Gotta get one. Any way, LIVE mix for ya. Just in time for the weekend. Tracklisting: 01 - Kenny_Dope_And_Terry_Hunter_Pres_Mass_Destruction_-_Get_Em_High_Main_Mix 02 - Pretty_Boy_Haters_Feat._8thw1_-_Body_(Get_Down)_(Main_Clean) 03 - Kid_Majesty_-_I'M_Your_Dj_(Dirty) 04 - Kenny_Dope_Pres._The_Hillsiders_-_I_Wanna_-_Dirty 05 - Kenny_Dope_Pres._The_Hillsiders_-_Flying_-_Feat_Mishal_Moore 06 - kenny_dope-warp_(main_mix) 07 - sun_of_aphrodite_-_vibrations__main_mix 08 - Terry_Hunter_Feat_Terisa_Griffin_-_Instrumental_Mix 09 - K._Dope_&_T._Hunter_Pres_Mass_Destruction_Ft._Byron_Stingily_-_No_More_Mind_Games_(Club_Mix) 10 - Liquid_Dope_Feat_Chronkite_-_I_Want_You_(Kenny_Dope_Dub) 11 - LadybugMek_-_You_Never_Get_Over_It_(Dance_Mix) 12 - Kenny_Dope___Terry_Hunter_Pres.Mass_Destruction_-_Somehow_Someway__Dub/Main Mix 13 - Mishal_Moore_-_Oh_Lord_(Muthafunkaz_Remix) 14 - Bucketheads_-_The_Bomb_(Kenny_Dope_Remix) Hope you enjoy. Please leave a comment and let me know. Stay Blessed. KAS

01 - Kenny_Dope_And_Terry_Hunter_Pres_Mass_Destruction_-_Get_Em_High_Main_Mix 02 - Pretty_Boy_Haters_Feat._8thw1_-_Body_(Get_Down)_(Main_Clean) 03 - Kid_Majesty_-_I'M_Your_Dj_(Dirty) 04 - Kenny_Dope_Pres._The_Hillsiders_-_I_Wanna_-_Dirty 05 - Kenny_Dope_Pres._The_Hillsiders_-_Flying_-_Feat_Mishal_Moore 06 - kenny_dope-warp_(main_mix) 07 - sun_of_aphrodite_-_vibrations__main_mix 08 - Terry_Hunter_Feat_Terisa_Griffin_-_Instrumental_Mix 09 - K._Dope_&_T._Hunter_Pres_Mass_Destruction_Ft._Byron_Stingily_-_No_More_Mind_Games_(Club_Mix) 10 - Liquid_Dope_Feat_Chronkite_-_I_Want_You_(Kenny_Dope_Dub) 11 - LadybugMek_-_You_Never_Get_Over_It_(Dance_Mix) 12 - Kenny_Dope___Terry_Hunter_Pres.Mass_Destruction_-_Somehow_Someway__Dub/Main Mix 13 - Mishal_Moore_-_Oh_Lord_(Muthafunkaz_Remix) 14 - Bucketheads_-_The_Bomb_(Kenny_Dope_Remix)
Hope you enjoy. Please leave a comment and let me know.
Stay Blessed.
KAS

item.title: Mojito Vol. 5 (Latin House)
item.description: Greetings all, It's been about a year now that I havent posted a latin selection, and Rafael Aguirre in Mexico is probably pissed off with me now, so this one is for you Rafael. Good Latin tracks are few and far between, and it's literally taken me this long to compile tracks that I want to play. Well, the mix was actually ready a couple months ago but I could'nt get into it until this morning. Mafer is putting on a big "Noche De Feria" party next month to celebrate the Colombian festvals and this is a pre for the session I'm gonna the droppin', just so everyone can get familiar as there's no Pitbull, Shakira nor Mark Antony in here!!!! Tracklisting: 01 - Broki - Es Que Lo Es (Kay Suzuki Mix) 02 - The Combinations - Mi Tumba(Club Mix) 03 - Ospina & Oscar P ft. Sammy Rosa - G.D.B.D. (Main Mix) 04 - Matthias Heilbronn & Joeski - Sabrosito (Original Mix) 05 - Steve Angello - La Candela Viva 06 - Coyu & Edu Imbernon - Morena 07 - The Cube Guys & Landmark - No Me Puedo Controlar(Landmark Biokosmos Vokal Mix) 08 - Mastiksoul ft. Carla Carlim - Baila Bonito (Original Mix) 09 - Sergio Fernandez - El Son Te Llama 10 - Austin Leeds - La Bonita(Original Mix) 11 - Fuldner Pooley - La Mania (David Herrero Remix) 12 - Alex Font - Angola (Original Mix) 13 - F. Physical - Cuban Dream (Original Mix) 14 - U-Ness feat. Robina - A Tu Lado 2010(U-Ness & Jedset 2010 Mix) Favorites: Alex Font's take on Cape Verdean superstar Cesária Évora's Angloa (You will remember the brilliant Carl Craig version on the Club Sodade album back in 2004), Broki's excellent use of Tego Calderon and Mastisoul's CRAZY beatdown on Baila Bonito. And there you have it. A few imperfections here and there, hope you don't notice, but that's what you get in a live mix. No production, no Ableton. STRAIGHT LIVE BABY!!!! I love this latin shit. Que Viva La Conga y el Bongo! Te quiero mucho, y gracias por visitar mi casita. Become a Fan, comment away, download. Be Blessed Kader

item.title: Deep Afro House Volume 3
item.description: So here's my tribute to the World Cup 2010. A solid mix of mostly current Afro House from the likes of Black Coffee, Boddhi Satva, Ralf Gum, Mangala Camara, Bucie, Qness and Shana to name a few. Did this one for the one and only Freddy Addae from Ghana. Respect brother, delivered as promised. Tracklisting: 01 - Sage_Monk_-_Mbeso_Ti_Abantu_(Main_Mix) 02 - Kay_Suzuki_-_Music_(Atjazz_Remix) 03 - Ricone_&_Lelethu_-_Olothando_(The_French_Twins_&_Koro_Tantric_Soul_Remix) 04 - Busi_Mhlongo_-_WeBaba_(Rocco_Underground_Mix) 05 - Boddhi_Satva_-_Maboko_Na_Ndouzou_(Main_Mix) 06 - Mangala Camara_-_'Wilile'_(Ancestral_Soul_Remix) 07 - Qness_Feat_Oluhle_-_Fugama_Unamathe_(Original_Mix) 08 - Qness_feat_Malehloka_-_Uzongilinda_(Abicah_Soul_Mix) 09 - Bucie_-_He_Is_Da_Man 10 - Black_Coffee_feat_Zakes_-_Juju 11 - Bernadette_Mutangara_-_Give_Me_Your_Love_(Pex_Africah_Remix) 12 - Shana_Iyo_Londaba_Ung_Phula_Intliziyo 13 - Black_Coffee_Feat._Zonke_-_Gardens_Of_Eden_(Ralf_Gum_Vocal) 14 - Zano_-_My_Story_(Ralf_Gum_Deeper_Vocal) As always, respect the music. If you like, please leave a comment, goes a long way. Bless Kader

item.title: DEEP AFRO HOUSE Vol. 2
item.description: A deeeeeep Afro House adventure with lots of new tracks. Manoo here on remix duties along with the man defining Afro deep house right now: Boddhi Satva. And would it be complete without some Wunmi? Hell No!!!! Enjoy folks, this one is a scorcher.... MY fathers day gift to you. 01 - Geoffrey Oryema - Piri Wango Iya (Boddhi Satva's Ancestral Soul Remix) 02 - Sekouba Bambino - Decourage (Charles Webster Remix) 03 - Mzee feat.Candy Nurse - Mahuwelele (Manoo Remix - Mzee Vocal Edit) 04 - AM Roots feat. Fred Mthembu - He Africa (Main Mix) 05 - Stan-ley & Dele Sosimi - Atide (Melchyor A's Hmida Version) 06 - Hanna Hais - I Say Gole (Boddhi Satva's Ancestral Treatment) 07 - Sister Pearl - Bang The Drum (Manoo Remix) 08 - Trancemicsoul - Ancestral Nights (Vocal Mix) 09 - Jephte Guillaume & Rufuss - Jou Sa (Main Mix) 10 - Da Lata feat. Diabel Cissokho - This Is Not Your Job (Da Lata House Mix) 11 - Raw Artistic Soul feat. Wunmi - Oya O (Main Mix) 12 - Pastaboys feat. Wunmi - Babalawo (Pastaboys Original Mix) 13 - Luisito Quintero - Gbagada Gbagada Gbogodo Gbogodo (LV EOL Remix) As always support the original artists as well as the remixers. Blessed Love Kader

item.title: Afro Deep Tek House Mix
item.description: ...and then here's one that I've been planning for a while now. I've been trying to put together something that would swing my Dad over for a minute and can't wait to hand a copy over to him. He's really the one person responsible for my affair with this music thing, and being surrounded by all types of musical influences from blues to rock, jazz to classical, and pop to reggae, you name it, we listened to it. (No country!!!!)And I thank him for never refusing me his system to rock a party!!! And not one busted speaker!!! Any way, here's the tracklisting: 01 - Bertrand Dupart - Ketokole (Boddhi Satva's Ancestrial Mix) 02 - Yacoub - Da Na Ma (Manoo Remix) 03 - Boddhi Satva - Punch Koto (Main Mix) 04 - Afefe Iku feat. Oveous Maximus - Mirror Dance (Yoruba Soul Mix) 05 - Kentphonik - Sunday Showers (Original Mix) 06 - Marlon D - Sizzling Congas (Underground Collective Mix) 07 - Anto Vitale - Majico (Original Mix) 08 - Gel Abril - Spells Of Yoruba 09 - Rodamaal feat. Claudia Franco - Insomnia (Main Mix) 10 - UPZ feat Patrick G - Ki Sa Ou Di (Yotam Avni Low Down Mix) 11 - Boddhi Satva feat Robert Walker - Get Up (Saltfish & Bammy Remix) 12 - Shana - Uyangichomela (Ralf GUM Deep Mix) 13 - Yonurican - Kokotaso (Original) As always, please support the artiste's and the remixers. And do leave a comment if you feel moved by the selection. Bless Kader
